Tools

Here are some tools that improve my quality of life. You might like them too.

spacemacs

A community-driven Emacs distribution.

spacemacs

org-mode

An Emacs major mode for note-taking and planning.

org-mode

LyX

Just say no to MS Word.

LyX

i3 window manager

A tiling window manager for GNU-Linux.

i3 window manager

Friendly Interactive SHell

Finally, a command line shell for the 90s.

Friendly Interactive SHell

Zotero

Open-source reference management package.

Zotero
